application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 Lime front left 16m high. Reduce to approx. 14 meters. 6m width reduce to 4m. To help improve light and contain spread and becoming oversized for its location, suggest: reduce and reshape by approx. 25% approx. 2m, remove trunk growth to approx. 4m.T2 Robinia front left 10 meters high, reduce to approx. 8m. 8m wide reduce to approx. 5m To contain crown spread, suggest: reduce back to previous reduction points approx. 2m, reduce back x2 branches over driveway by 3m to lessen weight.T3 Crab Apple front boundary2.5m high reduce to approx. 1.8m or 25% To contain spread: reduce back to previous reduction points to tidy and contain.T4 Lime x3 front ,9m high reduce to approx. 7m, 4m wide reduce to approx. 3m To maintain shape and contain crown spread. Suggest: reduce back to previous reduction points, approx., 2m.T5 Robinia front right9m high reduce to approx. 7.5m, 4m wide reduce to approx. 3m Smaller tree growing next to access drive. Suggest: reduce back to previous reduction points by approx. 2.5m to contain crown spread.T6 Sycamore front right10m high reduce to approx., 7.5m.,6m wide reduce to approx 4m. Near rear access gate. To contain crown spread  and help improve light into this area, suggest: reduce and reshape by approx. 2m. Clean out crown.T7 Sycamore x3 rear right Near bin storage. To tidy and contain, suggest: reduce back to previous reduction points approx. 1-2m.T8 Robinia rear right hand corner10m high reduce to approx.8m, 6m wide reduce to approx. 4mNear communal washing lines. To tidy and contain, suggest: reduce back to previous reduction points approx. 2mT9 Sycamore rear boundaryNo height reduction. Single tree. To improve light: reduce back overhang on garden side of the Spinney to previous points approx., 1-2m.
